verses.verse: וַיַּשְׁכֵּם֩ <S%H7925><s%> rose early יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בַּבֹּ֜קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וַיִּסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> and they removed מֵֽהַשִּׁטִּ֗ים <S%H7851><s%> from Shittim וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> to Jordan ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> he and all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיָּלִ֥נוּ <S%H3885><s%> and lodged שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there טֶ֥רֶם <S%H2962><s%> before יַעֲבֹֽרוּ׃ <S%H5674><s%> there before they passed over

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> become מִקְצֵ֖ה <S%H7097><s%> And it came to pass after שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> days וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <S%H5674><s%> went הַשֹּׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> that the officers בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> through הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> the host

וַיְצַוּוּ֮ <S%H6680><s%> And they commanded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying כִּרְאֽוֹתְכֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> When ye see אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְהַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites נֹשְׂאִ֖ים <S%H5375><s%> bearing אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> you תִּסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> it then ye shall remove מִמְּק֣וֹמְכֶ֔ם <S%H4725><s%> from your place וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֖ם <S%H1980><s%> and go אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <S%H310><s%> after

אַ֣ךְ ׀ <S%H389><s%> shall be a רָח֣וֹק <S%H7350><s%> Yet there shall be a space יִהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become בֵּֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H996><s%> among [וּבֵינֹו כ] (וּבֵינָ֔יו <S%H996><s%> among ק) כְּאַלְפַּ֥יִם <S%H505><s%> between you and it about two thousand אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> cubits בַּמִּדָּ֑ה <S%H4060><s%> by measure אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּקְרְב֣וּ <S%H7126><s%> come not near אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which תֵּֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> unto it that ye may know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> shall go בָ֔הּ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> have not עֲבַרְתֶּ֛ם <S%H5674><s%> for ye have not passed בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> [this] way מִתְּמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before that time ס

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people הִתְקַדָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H6942><s%> Sanctify כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מָחָ֗ר <S%H4279><s%> yourselves for to morrow יַעֲשֶׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> will do יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֖ם <S%H7130><s%> among נִפְלָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6381><s%> wonders

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> unto the priests לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying שְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> Take up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant וְעִבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> and pass over לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> the people וַיִּשְׂאוּ֙ <S%H5375><s%> And they took up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> and went לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> This day הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> This אָחֵל֙ <S%H2490><s%> will I begin גַּדֶּלְךָ֔ <S%H1431><s%> to magnify בְּעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> thee in the sight כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of all Israel אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> they יֵֽדְע֔וּן <S%H3045><s%> that they may know כִּ֗י <S%H3588><s%> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I הָיִ֛יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> that as I was with Moses אֶהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> have been עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וְאַתָּ֗ה <S%H859><s%> you תְּצַוֶּה֙ <S%H6680><s%> And thou shalt command אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֥י <S%H5375><s%> that bear אֲרֽוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> the ark הַבְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כְּבֹאֲכֶ֗ם <S%H935><s%> When ye are come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against קְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> to the brink מֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> of the water הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan בַּיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> in Jordan תַּעֲמֹֽדוּ׃ <S%H5975><s%> ye shall stand still פ

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel גֹּ֣שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> Come hither הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here וְשִׁמְע֕וּ <S%H8085><s%> and hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> the words יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua בְּזֹאת֙ <S%H2063><s%> you תֵּֽדְע֔וּן <S%H3045><s%> Hereby ye shall know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵ֥ל <S%H410><s%> God חַ֖י <S%H2416><s%> that the living בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <S%H7130><s%> [is] among וְהוֹרֵ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> you and [that] he will without fail יוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> drive out מִ֠פְּנֵיכֶם <S%H6440><s%> from before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכְּנַעֲנִ֨י <S%H3669><s%> you the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחִתִּ֜י <S%H2850><s%> and the Hittites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחִוִּ֗י <S%H2340><s%> and the Hivites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּרִזִּי֙ <S%H6522><s%> and the Perizzites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֔י <S%H1622><s%> and the Girgashites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> and the Amorites וְהַיְבוּסִֽי׃ <S%H2983><s%> and the Jebusites

הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> Behold the ark הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲד֖וֹן <S%H136><s%> of the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth עֹבֵ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> passeth over לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before בַּיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> you into Jordan

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> Now therefore take לָכֶם֙ שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men מִשִּׁבְטֵ֖י <S%H7626><s%> out of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> a man אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> out of every אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> men אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one לַשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribe

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> shall come כְּנ֣וֹחַ <S%H5117><s%> shall rest כַּפּ֣וֹת <S%H3709><s%> And it shall come to pass as soon as the soles רַגְלֵ֣י <S%H7272><s%> of the feet הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> of the priests נֹשְׂאֵי֩ <S%H5375><s%> that bear אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲד֤וֹן <S%H136><s%> the Lord כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of all the earth בְּמֵ֣י <S%H4325><s%> in the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan מֵ֤י <S%H4325><s%> [that] the waters הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan יִכָּ֣רֵת֔וּן <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַמַּ֥יִם <S%H4325><s%> [from] the waters הַיֹּרְדִ֖ים <S%H3381><s%> that come down מִלְמָ֑עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> from above וְיַעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> and they shall stand נֵ֥ד <S%H5067><s%> heap אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> upon an

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become בִּנְסֹ֤עַ <S%H5265><s%> removed הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> And it came to pass when the people מֵאָ֣הֳלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H168><s%> from their tents לַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> to pass over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests נֹֽשְׂאֵ֛י <S%H5375><s%> bearing הָאָר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הַבְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> the people

וּכְב֞וֹא <S%H935><s%> were come נֹשְׂאֵ֤י <S%H5375><s%> And as they that bare הָֽאָרוֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> the ark עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> into הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> unto Jordan וְרַגְלֵ֤י <S%H7272><s%> and the feet הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests נֹשְׂאֵ֣י <S%H5375><s%> that bare הָֽאָר֔וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark נִטְבְּל֖וּ <S%H2881><s%> were dipped בִּקְצֵ֣ה <S%H7097><s%> in the brim הַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> of the water וְהַיַּרְדֵּ֗ן <S%H3383><s%> (for Jordan מָלֵא֙ <S%H4390><s%> overfloweth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּדוֹתָ֔יו <S%H1415><s%> all his banks כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> all the time קָצִֽיר׃ <S%H7105><s%> bough

וַיַּעַמְד֡וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood הַמַּיִם֩ <S%H4325><s%> That the waters הַיֹּרְדִ֨ים <S%H3381><s%> which came down מִלְמַ֜עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> from above קָ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> [and] rose up נֵד־ <S%H5067><s%> heap אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> upon an הַרְחֵ֨ק <S%H7368><s%> far מְאֹ֜ד <S%H3966><s%> very [בָאָדָם כ] (מֵֽאָדָ֤ם <S%H121><s%> Adam ק) הָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> from the city אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> is מִצַּ֣ד <S%H6654><s%> that [is] beside צָֽרְתָ֔ן <S%H6891><s%> Zaretan וְהַיֹּרְדִ֗ים <S%H3381><s%> and those that came down עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> toward יָ֧ם <S%H3220><s%> toward the sea הָעֲרָבָ֛ה <S%H6160><s%> of the plain יָם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea הַמֶּ֖לַח <S%H4417><s%> [even] the salt תַּ֣מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> failed נִכְרָ֑תוּ <S%H3772><s%> [and] were cut off וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and the people עָבְר֖וּ <S%H5674><s%> passed over נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> opposite יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> right against Jericho

וַיַּעַמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> stood הַכֹּהֲנִ֡ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests נֹ֠שְׂאֵי <S%H5375><s%> that bare הָאָר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark בְּרִית־ <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֶּחָֽרָבָ֛ה <S%H2724><s%> on dry ground בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan הָכֵ֑ן <S%H3559><s%> firm וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> and all the Israelites עֹֽבְרִים֙ <S%H5674><s%> passed over בֶּחָ֣רָבָ֔ה <S%H2724><s%> on dry ground עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after תַּ֙מּוּ֙ <S%H8552><s%> clean כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּ֔וֹי <S%H1471><s%> until all the people לַעֲבֹ֖ר <S%H5674><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan
